text: @realDonaldTrump Holy Shit #CovidTrump19Virus is in every single state it is here it's NOT GOING AWAY it will bounce from person to person home to home The President is banking on Warmer Weather to slow the Virus down don't be stupid it's in Latin America as well as the United States!#Coronavirus

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
